name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 1 prompt = 5 answers (ChatGPT, Gemini, Copilot, Perplexity, Claude)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 1 prompt = 5 answers (ChatGPT, Gemini, Microsoft Copilot, Perplexity, Claude) by Casper

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
enables you to:

➤ Send One Prompt to Multiple AI Models Simultaneously
• Write your question/prompt once
• Get answers from up to 5 different AI models at the same time:

➤ Compare Different AI Responses
• See how different AI models approach the same question
• Compare quality, accuracy, and creativity of responses
• Choose the best answer for your needs

➤ Time-Efficient Workflow
• No need to copy/paste your prompt multiple times

➤ Customize Your Experience
• Select which AI models you want to use
• Switch between light and dark modes

Shortcuts:
•  "alt" + "c" = Open / Close extension window
•  "alt" + "enter" = Send prompt
•  "alt" + "1" = enable / disable ChatGPT
•  "alt" + "2" = enable / disable Gemini
•  "alt" + "3" = enable / disable Copilot 
•  "alt" + "4" = enable / disable Perplexity
•  "alt" + "5" = enable / disable Claude

❗Warning: Log in to all AI chatbots before using the extension for it to work properly❗
